name: Spirit of Fire
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: Smoldering flames burn bright from within the soul, sparking a hunger for insight and destruction.

editions.flavor: The leyline within Flagma flares to life once more, bathing intrepid souls in a fiery vortex of might.
The leyline within Flagma flares to life once more, bathing intrepid souls in a fiery vortex of might.
The vermillion bird blazes a fiery trail across the horizon, alight with a passion for knowledge.

name: Spirit of Water
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: Convalescing waves cascade through the soul, revitalizing the body and mind from the depths.

editions.flavor: The leyline buried in Krustal shatters awake again, infusing dauntless souls with freezing clarity.
The leyline buried in Krustal shatters awake again, infusing dauntless souls with freezing clarity.
The tides and waves thrash again as serpent and tortoise entwined awaken from their slumber.

name: Spirit of Wind
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: Turbulent zephyrs swirl around the soul, inspiring fleet-footed dreams and expedited efficiency.

editions.flavor: The leyline encircling Winbless surges forward, invigorating curious souls with a spark of ingenuity.
The leyline encircling Winbless surges forward, invigorating curious souls with a spark of ingenuity.
Auspicious fortune and good tidings follow the silver tiger on its fleet-footed journey through seasons.

name: Lorraine, Wandering Warrior
effect: On Enter: Materialize a weapon card with memory cost 0 from your material deck.
effect_raw: On Enter: Materialize a weapon card with memory cost 0 from your material deck.

rule.description: You still need to pay the costs of the weapon. Most of the time, this cost will be 0. However, if an effect modifies the cost of the card, this cost must be paid. In addition, if the selected card has an additional cost of materialization, that cost must also be paid.

flavor: “This beautiful world we have been tasked to save... It carries such a stench of smoke and ash.”

name: Lorraine, Blademaster
effect: Lorraine Lineage (Lorraine, Blademaster must be leveled from a previous level "Lorraine" champion.) On Enter: Until end of turn, Lorraine's attacks get +2 and gain "On Kill: Draw a card."
effect_raw:
Lorraine Lineage (Lorraine, Blademaster must be leveled from a previous level "Lorraine" champion.)
On Enter: Until end of turn, Lorraine's attacks get +2 power and gain "On Kill: Draw a card."

rule.description: With the On Enter effect, Lorraine's attacks get the additional effects, not Lorraine herself. This means that Lorraine still needs a weapon or attack card in order to declare attacks because she does not have an attack stat.

flavor: "Let me show you true swordistry."

result_editions.effect: Lorraine Lineage On Enter: Until end of turn, Lorraine's attacks get +2 and gain "On Kill: Draw a card."

effect_raw: On Enter: Put two enlighten counters on Rai. (You may remove three enlighten counters from your champion to draw a card.)

effect_raw:

name: Silvie, Wilds Whisperer
effect: On Enter: The next Animal or Beast ally card you activate this turn enters the field with an additional buff counter on it. (Allies get +1 power and +1 life for each buff counter on them.)
effect_raw: On Enter: The next Animal or Beast ally card you activate this turn enters the field with an additional buff counter on it. (Allies get +1 power and +1 life for each buff counter on them.)
flavor: "Hey, look! Aren't my new friends cute?"

result_editions.effect: On Enter: The next Animal or Beast ally card you activate this turn enters the field with an additional buff counter on it.

editions.effect: On Enter: The next Animal or Beast ally card you activate this turn enters the field with an additional buff counter on it.

name: Silvie, With the Pack
effect: Silvie Lineage (Silvie, With the Pack must be leveled from a previous level "Silvie" champion.) On Enter: If you control an Animal ally, draw a card. If you control a Beast ally, draw a card.
effect_raw:
Silvie Lineage (Silvie, With the Pack must be leveled from a previous level "Silvie" champion.)
On Enter: If you control an Animal ally, draw a card. If you control a Beast ally, draw a card.

rule.description: If you control both an Animal and a Beast during the resolution of the On Enter effect, you will draw two cards.

flavor: "Let's see if we can find your family!"

result_editions.effect: Silvie Lineage On Enter: If you control an Animal ally, draw a card. If you control a Beast ally, draw a card.

editions.effect: Silvie Lineage On Enter: If you control an Animal ally, draw a card. If you control a Beast ally, draw a card.

effect: Silvie Lineage (Silvie, Earth's Tune must be leveled from a previous level "Silvie" champion.) On Enter: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a tera element Animal or Beast ally card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck in a random order.
effect_raw:
Silvie Lineage (Silvie, Earth's Tune must be leveled from a previous level "Silvie" champion.)

name: Zander, Prepared Scout
effect: On Enter: Glimpse 2. Put a preparation counter on Zander. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)
effect_raw: On Enter: Glimpse 2. Put a preparation counter on Zander. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)
flavor: "In this new dawn, I embark with clear purpose and conviction."

result_editions.effect: On Enter: Glimpse 2. Put a preparation counter on Zander.

editions.effect: On Enter: Glimpse 2. Put a preparation counter on Zander.

name: Zander, Always Watching
effect: Zander Lineage (Zander, Always Watching must be leveled from a previous level "Zander" champion.) Inherited Effect: As long as Zander is attacking a rested unit, Zander's attacks get +1. (Your champion has this ability as long as this card is part of its lineage.)
effect_raw:
Zander Lineage (Zander, Always Watching must be leveled from a previous level "Zander" champion.)
Inherited Effect: As long as Zander is attacking a rested unit, Zander's attacks get +1 power. (Your champion has this ability as long as this card is part of its lineage.)

rule.description: If Zander is attacking multiple rested units with Cleave, the attack only gets +1 power, not +1 power for each rested unit.

result_editions.effect: Zander Lineage Inherited Effect: As long as Zander is attacking a rested unit, Zander's attacks get +1.

editions.effect: Zander Lineage Inherited Effect: As long as Zander is attacking a rested unit, Zander's attacks get +1.
editions.flavor: "Eyes open. Daggers ready."

name: Zander, Corhazi's Chosen
effect: Zander Lineage (Zander, Corhazi's Chosen must be leveled from a previous level "Zander" champion.) On Enter: Zander gains stealth and spellshroud until the beginning of your next turn. Put a preparation counter on Zander. (Units with spellshroud can't be targeted by Spells.)
effect_raw:
Zander Lineage (Zander, Corhazi's Chosen must be leveled from a previous level "Zander" champion.)
On Enter: Zander gains stealth and spellshroud until the beginning of your next turn. Put a preparation counter on Zander. (Units with spellshroud can't be targeted by Spells.)

result_editions.effect: Zander Lineage On Enter: Zander gains stealth and spellshroud until the beginning of your next turn. Put a preparation counter on Zander.

editions.effect: Zander Lineage On Enter: Zander gains stealth and spellshroud until the beginning of your next turn. Put a preparation counter on Zander.
editions.flavor: "Brilliant light, become my mantle!"

name: Allen, Beast Beckoner
effect: On Enter: Glimpse 3, then reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a Harmony or Melody card, put it into your hand. As long as you control two or more Animal and/or Beast allies, Allen gets +2 level.
effect_raw:
On Enter: Glimpse 3, then reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a Harmony or Melody card, put it into your hand.
As long as you control two or more Animal and/or Beast allies, Allen gets +2 level.

rule.description: To get Allen's +2 level effect active, you can either control two Animals, one Animal and one Beast, or two Beasts.

flavor: "I'm working on a tune. Care to listen?"

name: Merlin, Memory Thief
effect: : Choose a card from a graveyard and banish it. If that card has floating memory, put a level counter on Merlin. (Champions get +1 level for each level counter on them.)
effect_raw: REST: Choose a card from a graveyard and banish it. If that card has floating memory, put a level counter on Merlin. (Champions get +1 level for each level counter on them.)

rule.description: If Merlin's ability banishes a card that has Floating Memory but is restricted by a Class Bonus, a level counter will only be placed on Merlin if that card's owner has that Class Bonus restriction enabled.

flavor: "Just forget. It will be easier for you."

editions.effect: : Choose a card from a graveyard and banish it. If that card has floating memory, put a level counter on Merlin.

name: Mordred, Flawless Blade
effect: Attack cards in your graveyard have floating memory. (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw: Attack cards in your graveyard have floating memory. (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

rule.description: Multiple instances of floating memory on the same card are redundant. Any instances beyond the first are ignored.

flavor: "Do try to keep up, won't you?"

editions.effect: Attack cards in your graveyard have floating memory.
editions.flavor: With swordistry embodying the idea of a torrent, Mordred gives foes no respite from his blade.

name: Tristan, Grim Stalker
effect: On Ally Hit: You may remove three preparation counters from Tristan. If you do, destroy the hit ally. At the beginning of your end phase, if Tristan is awake, put a preparation counter on Tristan.
effect_raw:
On Ally Hit: You may remove three preparation counters from Tristan. If you do, destroy the hit ally.
At the beginning of your end phase, if Tristan is awake, put a preparation counter on Tristan.
flavor: "Life is cheap. Just tell me how many."

name: Assassin's Ripper
effect: Class Bonus, Remove a preparation counter from your champion: Assassin's Ripper gets +2 until end of turn.
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] REST, Remove a preparation counter from your champion: Assassin's Ripper gets +2 power until end of turn.

rule.description: Weapons can still be used for an attack even when they're rested.

flavor: As menacing as it is sharp, this dagger is most useful in the hands of an assassin.

name: Bauble of Abundance
effect: Banish Bauble of Abundance: Each player draws a card.
effect_raw: Banish Bauble of Abundance: Each player draws a card.
flavor: Glittering trinkets, coins, and treasures. Plenty enough to be shared among friend and foe alike.

editions.flavor: The imperial treasury lies unclaimed. Both avaricious and ambitious covet the wealth hidden within.

name: Bauble of Mending
effect: Banish Bauble of Mending: Draw a card. Class Bonus: Up to one target non-Human ally you control gets +1 until end of turn. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: Banish Bauble of Mending: Draw a card. Class Bonus: Up to one target non-Human ally you control gets +1 life until end of turn. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: Nature's grace soothes most minor injuries.

name: Beastbond Boots
effect: Banish Beastbond Boots: Your champion gains spellshroud until end of turn. Activate this ability only if you control an Animal or Beast ally. (Units with spellshroud can't be targeted by Spells.)
effect_raw: Banish Beastbond Boots: Your champion gains spellshroud until end of turn. Activate this ability only if you control an Animal or Beast ally. (Units with spellshroud can't be targeted by Spells.)

rule.description: The condition of needing to control an Animal or Beast ally is only checked upon activating the ability of Beastbond Boots.

flavor: A tamer's bond with their beast goes beyond simple empathy.

name: Beastbond Ears
effect: Your champion gets +1 level as long as you control an Animal or Beast ally.
effect_raw: Your champion gets +1 level as long as you control an Animal or Beast ally.
flavor: The easiest way to gain a beast's favor is to first look like them.

name: Beastbond Paws
effect: Banish Beastbond Paws: Target Animal or Beast ally you control gets +1 and gains true sight until end of turn. (Units with true sight can attack units with stealth.)
effect_raw: Banish Beastbond Paws: Target Animal or Beast ally you control gets +1 power and gains true sight until end of turn. (Units with true sight can attack units with stealth.)
flavor: A beast's ferocity and a tamer's guidance make for a formidable combination.

name: Blinding Orb
effect: Banish Blinding Orb: Each opponent puts two cards from their hand into their memory. Class Bonus: Draw a card. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: Banish Blinding Orb: Each opponent puts two cards from their hand into their memory. Class Bonus: Draw a card. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: A useful tool, both in flight and fight.

name: Chalice of Blood
effect: Banish Chalice of Blood: Draw two cards. Activate this ability only if your champion has twenty or more damage counters on them.
effect_raw: Banish Chalice of Blood: Draw two cards. Activate this ability only if your champion has twenty or more damage counters on them.

rule.description: The condition of needing twenty or more damage counters on your champion is only checked upon activating the ability of Chalice of Blood.

flavor: An offering born of blood is stronger than just an empty prayer.

name: Channeling Stone
effect: Banish Channeling Stone: The next card you activate this turn costs 2 less to activate.
effect_raw: Banish Channeling Stone: The next card you activate this turn costs 2 less to activate.

rule.description: The cost decrease only affects cards that are activated, not materialized.

The type of cost decreased is based on the card's default cost type. In most cases, it will decrease reserve cost because it only affects activation costs. However, if a card can be activated from the material deck and has a memory cost as its default cost, the memory cost will decrease by 2.

flavor: Charged with excess magic, these stones enable apprentice mages to cast powerful spells beyond their capabilities.

name: Crystal of Argus
effect: Class BonusYour champion gets +1 level for every three enlighten counters on them. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] Your champion gets +1 level for every three enlighten counters on them. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: In seeing all, he knew all. In knowing all, he ascended.

name: Crystal of Empowerment
effect: Banish Crystal of Empowerment: Your champion gets +2 level until end of turn.
effect_raw: Banish Crystal of Empowerment: Your champion gets +2 level until end of turn.
flavor: Mages often store their excess mana into such crystals. If used by even a novice mage, one might mistake them for far greater.

name: Curved Dagger
effect: Class BonusAs long as your champion is attacking an ally, Curved Dagger gets +1. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] As long as your champion is attacking an ally, Curved Dagger gets +1 power. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: Its curved edge is perfect for slicing through the flesh of both man and monster.

name: Discordia, Harp of Malice
effect: Whenever you activate a Harmony or Melody card, put a music counter on Discordia. : Target champion gets -X level and your champion gets +X level until end of turn, where X is the amount of music counters on Discordia. At the beginning of the next end phase, banish Discordia.
effect_raw:
Whenever you activate a Harmony or Melody card, put a music counter on Discordia.
REST: Target champion gets -X level and your champion gets +X level until end of turn, where X is the amount of music counters on Discordia. At the beginning of the next end phase, banish Discordia.

rule.description: The amount of level drained is only calculated during the resolution of Discordia's effect. If the amount of music counters on Discordia changes after the resolution of its effect, the amount of level changed does not adjust.

If Discordia does not exist on the field during the resolution of its effect, the amount of music counters relevant for the ability is based on the last known amount of music counters of this instance of Discordia.

name: Drawn Blade
effect: Class BonusOn Enter: Draw a card. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] On Enter: Draw a card. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: Oiled and sharpened, this sword can be unsheathed faster than a foe can react.

name: Excalibur, Cursed Sword
effect: Class BonusOn Enter: Choose a player. That player gains control of Excalibur. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.) Whenever you materialize a card, deal 2 damage to your champion.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] On Enter: Choose a player. That player gains control of Excalibur. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
Whenever you materialize a card, deal 2 damage to your champion.

name: Eye of Argus
effect: Banish Eye of Argus: Target ally you control gains true sight until end of turn. Draw a card. (Units with true sight can attack units with stealth.)
effect_raw: Banish Eye of Argus: Target ally you control gains true sight until end of turn. Draw a card. (Units with true sight can attack units with stealth.)

rule.description: If the target for the effect becomes invalid during the resolution, the entire effect is negated, including the card draw.

flavor: A gift from the many-eyed giant. Heroes prize its penetrating gaze.

name: Fire Resonance Bauble
effect: Banish Fire Resonance Bauble: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a fire element champion.
effect_raw: Banish Fire Resonance Bauble: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a fire element champion.
flavor: Captured, perhaps, but never tamed. This spirit's owner must always err on the side of caution.

name: Galatine, Sword of Sunlight
effect: Whenever you activate a Sword attack card, put a durability counter on Galatine. Class BonusGalatine gets +1 for every three durability counters on it.
effect_raw:
Whenever you activate a Sword attack card, put a durability counter on Galatine.
[Class Bonus] Galatine gets +1 power for every three durability counters on it.

rule.description: Durability counters are removed from weapons being used in an attack during the damage step of the combat phase. This allows Galatine to gain durability counters when attack cards are activated before losing it in the combat phase.

flavor: Galatine resonates with the will of its wielder, becoming brighter with each strike.

name: Grand Crusader's Ring
effect: Divine Relic (You can only have one card with this keyword in your material deck.) Banish Grand Crusader's Ring: Draw a card.
effect_raw:
Divine Relic (You can only have one card with this keyword in your material deck.)
Banish Grand Crusader's Ring: Draw a card.
flavor: A relic awarded for heroic deeds, this artifact was the first of many sealed within the Divine Reliquary.

editions.flavor: Given to select champions to signify the divine beings they serve, this ring grants its wearer great authority.

name: Jewel of Enlightenment
effect: Banish Jewel of Enlightenment: Put an enlighten counter on your champion. (You may remove three enlighten counters from your champion to draw a card.)
effect_raw: Banish Jewel of Enlightenment: Put an enlighten counter on your champion. (You may remove three enlighten counters from your champion to draw a card.)
flavor: Recording their thoughts into gems, mages planned keenly for their posterity.

name: Life Essence Amulet
effect: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.
effect_raw: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.
flavor:
"It is said a great alchemist made this amulet for his lover should she be at death's door."
— Gildas, Chronicler of Aesa

editions.flavor:
"An occultist's desperate pursuit for immortality. However, what came back was but only a husk."
– Si Ma Hui, Hermit Sage

"An alchemist's impossible wish to bring his dearly departed beloved back from the other side."
— Astarte, Celestial Dawn

name: Mana Limiter
effect: You can't remove enlighten counters from your champion to pay for costs. Banish Mana Limiter: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if your champion has six or more enlighten counters on them.
effect_raw:
You can't remove enlighten counters from your champion to pay for costs. 
Banish Mana Limiter: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if your champion has six or more enlighten counters on them.

rule.description: Mana Limiter's static ability prevents you from using three enlighten counters to draw, in addition to any other effects that require you to remove enlighten counters as a cost.

name: Map of Hidden Passage
effect: Map of Hidden Passage enters the field rested. , Banish Map of Hidden Passage: Until end of turn, units with stealth can't be intercepted.
effect_raw:
Map of Hidden Passage enters the field rested.
REST, Banish Map of Hidden Passage: Until end of turn, units with stealth can't be intercepted.

rule.description: Units with stealth that enter the field after the resolution of Map of Hidden Passage's ability still can't be intercepted.

flavor: No great general can be considered clever if they do not account for cheaters.

name: Melodious Flute
effect: Your champion gets +1 level as long as you control an Animal or Beast ally. Class BonusBanish Melodious Flute: The next Harmony action card you activate this turn is a Melody in addition to its other types.
effect_raw:
Your champion gets +1 level as long as you control an Animal or Beast ally.
[Class Bonus] Banish Melodious Flute: The next Harmony action card you activate this turn is a Melody in addition to its other types.

name: Orb of Glitter
effect: At the beginning of your recollection phase, glimpse 1. Banish Orb of Glitter: Draw a card.
effect_raw:
At the beginning of your recollection phase, glimpse 1.
Banish Orb of Glitter: Draw a card.
flavor: These orbs adorn many studies of fortune-tellers. In the hands of a diviner, it is truly a tool of great power.

editions.flavor: The fleeting iridescences that wavers in the orb shows both what could be and what could have been.

name: Orb of Regret
effect: Banish Orb of Regret: Shuffle up to three cards from your hand into your deck, then draw that many cards.
effect_raw: Banish Orb of Regret: Shuffle up to three cards from your hand into your deck, then draw that many cards.
flavor: No being is truly bound to their fate, at least not when the will of the divine can be swayed.

editions.flavor: Nothing is powerful enough to break free of destiny's hold, but some blessed artifacts can ease it's grasp.

name: Ornamental Greatsword
effect: Class BonusOn Enter: Target ally you control gets +1 until end of turn. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] On Enter: Target ally you control gets +1 power until end of turn. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: An ornate and pristine sword used ceremoniously with great effect, though dull of edge.

name: Poisoned Coating Oil
effect: Banish Poisoned Coating Oil: Target ally you control with stealth gets +2 until end of turn.
effect_raw: Banish Poisoned Coating Oil: Target ally you control with stealth gets +2 power until end of turn.
flavor: Skills are not always the most lethal weapon in an assassin's toolbox.

name: Poisoned Dagger
effect: Poisoned Dagger enters the field rested. , Banish Poisoned Dagger: Deal 1 damage to target unit. Class Bonus: Until end of turn, if that unit were to take damage, it takes that much damage plus 1 instead.
effect_raw:
Poisoned Dagger enters the field rested.
REST, Banish Poisoned Dagger: Deal 1 damage to target unit. Class Bonus: Until end of turn, if that unit were to take damage, it takes that much damage plus 1 instead.
flavor: A little poison goes a long way.

name: Safeguard Amulet
effect: Banish Safeguard Amulet: If your champion would take non-combat damage this turn, prevent 4 of that damage.
effect_raw: Banish Safeguard Amulet: If your champion would take non-combat damage this turn, prevent 4 of that damage.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: 'Whenever your champion would take non-attack damage this turn' -> 'If your champion would take non-attack damage this turn'

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: non-attack damage' -> 'non-combat damage'

flavor: Hopefully enough to block a fatal spell.

name: Sealed Blade
effect: Pay only using floating memory for this card's memory cost. Class BonusSealed Blade gets +1.
effect_raw:
Pay only using floating memory for this card's memory cost.
[Class Bonus] Sealed Blade gets +1 power.

rule.description: Additional costs levied onto Sealed Blade must also be paid with Floating Memory. If Sealed Blade gains an additional cost that isn't a memory cost, then it's costs can't be paid for.

flavor: An ephemeral sword that can be wielded only when bound.

name: Seer's Sword
effect: Class BonusOn Attack: Glimpse 2. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] On Attack: Glimpse 2. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)
flavor: Even a simple enchantment grants great advantage.

name: Sharpening Stone

name: Gaia's Blessing
effect: Element BonusYou may banish four Animal and/or Beast ally cards from your graveyard to activate this card from your material deck without paying its costs. Play with the top card of your deck revealed. You may activate Animal and Beast ally cards from the top of your deck.
effect_raw:
[Element Bonus] You may banish four Animal and/or Beast ally cards from your graveyard to activate this card from your material deck without paying its costs. 
Play with the top card of your deck revealed.
You may activate Animal and Beast ally cards from the top of your deck.

rule.description: Using the ability of Gaia's Blessing to allow its activation from the material deck means you do not need a materialization phase to get it out. Activating a card is done at slow speed by default.
Activating Gaia's Blessing by using its effect will ignore all costs associated with activating it, including any cost granting and cost increasing effects being applied.
Each card banished from the graveyard counts as one card. Banishing a card that is both an Animal and Beast does not count as two cards banished for the effect of Gaia's Blessing.

name: Horn of Beastcalling
effect: Banish Horn of Beastcalling: The next Beast ally card you activate this turn costs 3 less to activate. Class Bonus: Draw a card. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: Banish Horn of Beastcalling: The next Beast ally card you activate this turn costs 3 less to activate. Class Bonus: Draw a card. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

rule.description: The cost decrease only affects Beast ally cards that are activated, not materialized.

The type of cost decreased is based on the card's default cost type. In most cases, it will decrease reserve cost because it only affects activation costs. However, if a card can be activated from the material deck and has a memory cost as its default cost, the memory cost will decrease by 3.

flavor: Few beasts can resist Gaia's call.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: 'At the beginning of your end phase, sacrifice all Sword weapons you control.' -> 'At the beginning of your next end phase, sacrifice all Sword weapons you control.'
The Sword weapons may attack as though they were allies, but are not actually allies. This means that they don't take retaliation damage, or damage in general.
When a Sword weapon attacks as though it were an ally, a durability counter is removed from it upon dealing damage during the damage step.
